name: this apartment has neurodivergents in it
name_original: this apartment has neurodivergents in it
description:
this is the first game i ever made! just a little bit of playing around with bitsy. i have ambitions. 

this is a short (maybe 2-5 minutes) game where you walk around my apartment and touch my stuff. 
arrow keys or wasd are all the controls you need.

(the cat's name is silas.)
